content:
GhostESP lets you learn IR signals, store them on the SD card, and retransmit them using the onboard LED.
Supported protocolsNEC / NECext Kaseikyo Pioneer RCA Samsung SIRC (12-bit, 15-bit, 20-bit) RC5 RC6 If a remote uses an unsupported protocol, GhostESP still attempts to capture raw timings so you can replay the signal.
title: Infrared
